meanings.definition: Suckiest (adjective): the most unpleasant or disappointing
meanings.sent1: The movie was the suckiest thing I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: This is the suckiest day of my life.
meanings.sent3: Eating broccoli is the suckiest part of being healthy.
meanings.sent4: Losing my favorite toy was the suckiest moment of my childhood.
meanings.sent5: The taste of medicine is the suckiest taste in the world.

meanings.definition: Suckiest (noun): the worst or most undesirable option
meanings.sent1: Choosing the wrong path was the suckiest decision I made.
meanings.sent2: This is the suckiest situation we could be in.
meanings.sent3: Being stuck in traffic is the suckiest part of driving.
meanings.sent4: Losing the game was the suckiest outcome for our team.
meanings.sent5: The burnt toast is the suckiest breakfast choice.

meanings.definition: Suckiest (verb): to be the least skilled or successful in a particular situation
meanings.sent1: I always feel like I suckiest at math.
meanings.sent2: She suckiest at playing the guitar in our group.
meanings.sent3: My cat seems to suckiest at catching mice.
meanings.sent4: He suckiest at remembering people's names.
meanings.sent5: The team knew they would suckiest in the competition.
